I'm proud of my ability to adapt to change.

content.text: Hey there, I'm in Pittsburgh for work. What's your favorite thing about the city?
Hi there, I live in Pittsburgh. The food scene is really growing here. I like that there's always something new to try. What about you?
I'm a big fan of the music scene here. There are so many great bands that come through town.
I've heard good things about the music scene. I'm not much of a concert goer, but I've been to a few shows at the Rex Theater.
The Rex is a great venue. Have you been to the Altar Bar?
No, I haven't. I'll have to check it out.
It's a lot smaller than the Rex, but it's got a really cool vibe.
Sounds like my kind of place. I'll definitely check it out.
You should. It's a great spot to catch a local band.
Thanks for the recommendation. I'm always looking for new places to go.
No problem. I'm always happy to help out a fellow Pittsburgher.
